wikipedia_page.main: Charles Thomas (8 February 1864 – 8 March 1948) was a Welsh international rugby union utility player who played club rugby for Newport and invitational rugby for the Barbarians. Thomas won nine caps for Wales.

response: *Charlie Thomas (politician) (1915–1976), politician, New Brunswick member of Canadian Parliament
* Charlie Thomas (rugby union) (1864–1948), Welsh international rugby player
* Charlie Thomas, former owner of the Houston Rockets
*Charlie Thomas (director) (born 1961), British documentary maker and sports presenter
*Charlie Thomas (musician) (born 1937), American rhythm and blues singer, most notably in The Drifters
